text: 20 hours per week. Part-time caretaker is required to support the Facilities Manager with management of the councils building by ensuring the security and maintenance of all buildings within the operational property portfolio together with the provision of an efficient and responsive service. Applicants should note that a criminal records check by the Disclosure & Barring Service (DBS) will be necessary for the successful applicant. Shift pattern as follows: Ravens Court 6.00 pm  6.55 pm. Bryncethin Depot 7.10 pm  7.25 pm. Trem Y Mor 7.35 pm  8.35 pm. Pyle Life Centre 8.50 pm  9.45 pm. Closing Date: 22nd September 2021.

Part-time caretaker is required to support the Facilities Manager with management of the council’s building by ensuring the security and maintenance of all buildings within the operational property portfolio together with the provision of an efficient and responsive service.

Applicants should note that a criminal records check by the Disclosure & Barring Service (DBS) will be necessary for the successful applicant.

Shift pattern as follows:
Raven’s Court 6.00 pm – 6.55 pm
Bryncethin Depot 7.10 pm – 7.25 pm
Trem Y Mor 7.35 pm – 8.35 pm
Pyle Life Centre 8.50 pm – 9.45 pm

Closing Date: 22nd September 2021"}
